item.description:
This meetup may appeal more to the gals in the group, but all are welcome to attend!
We've got a double feature beginnning with Audrey Hepburn's Sabrina, followed by Roman Holiday, thanks Sheryl. We will meet at the wonderful clubhouse in Bedford, the one with the Home Theatre video system. Please bring a potluck and beverage of choice. We need to set the meetup fee at $10 for use of the clubhouse and cleaning fee. Where else can you enjoy movies, friends, food and drinks for 10 bux?

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: Sabrina and Saturday Night At The Movies
